name: Godot Third Person Combat Controller
description:
Godot Third Person Combat Controller

Control:

Controller Supported

Keyboard:

-Arrow keys: movement

-z: light attack

-x: heavy attack

-c: grab/throw

-a: block

-a+z: counter

-s: reset camera

-d: ride/unride bicycle

-shift: focus mode

-ctrl: dodge/run (holding)
